questions.question: A software project has 5 modules. Each module takes 8 hours to complete. If 2 developers work on different modules simultaneously, how many hours will it take to complete the entire project?

stepByStep: Both work simultaneously, so total time = max(24, 16) = 24 hours
But we need to distribute evenly: 5 modules / 2 developers = 2.5 modules each
Dev 1: 3 modules = 24 hours, Dev 2: 2 modules = 16 hours
Optimal: Dev 1 does 3 (24h), Dev 2 does 2 (16h) = 24 hours total
Better distribution: Each does 2.5 modules = 2.5 × 8 = 20 hours
explanation.answer: 20 hours is the optimal answer when work is distributed evenly

questions.question: Write a function to find the largest number in an array of integers.
hints: Start by assuming the first element is the largest
Loop through all elements and compare each with the current largest
Update the largest value when you find a bigger number
Return the largest value after the loop ends

sampleSolution.explanation: Initialize largest with first element, iterate through array comparing each element, update largest when bigger value found

You can reverse the string and compare with original

sampleSolution.explanation: Method 1: Reverse string and compare. Method 2: Use two pointers from start and end
